pullRequest.title: Clarify how to use orderBy parameter in executeMetadataQuery
pullRequest.bodyText: Add orderBy and indexName parameters to executeMetadataQuery(BoxAPIConnection api, String from, String query, JsonObject queryParameters, String ancestorFolderId, String indexName, JsonArray orderBy) example to more closely mimic the REST API

commit.message:
Clarify how to use orderBy parameter in executeMetadataQuery

Add orderBy and indexName parameters to `executeMetadataQuery(BoxAPIConnection api, String from, String query, JsonObject queryParameters, String ancestorFolderId, String indexName, JsonArray orderBy)` example to more closely mimic the REST API

nodes.bodyText: @randyjohnston what is this null here for? Is this the index name? Would it make sense to expand this example to just show how to use everything?
